item.item: STRING: The item id (can also be a list of strings, then any of the listed has to be in this slot)
item.data: INTEGER: data value of the item, neglected if not provided
item.durability: FLOAT: durability of the item, 1=full, 0=broken, neglected if not provided

return.data: INTEGER: data value of the item, default = 0
return.durability: FLOAT: durability of the item, 1=full, 0=broken, default = 1

exp: FLOAT: the amount of exp you get for this smelt

functions.item: STRING: the item to replace the original item with, default = the player the item it had put in
functions.nbt: STRING: Optional, what tags it gets, default = empty
functions.keep_nbt: STRING: Optional, what tags to keep, empty means all tags, {} means none, default = {}
functions.data: INTEGER: data value of the item, default = 0
functions.durability: FLOAT: durability of the item, 1=full, 0=broken, default = 1

functions.tag: The tag of the result item that gets scaled by durability, values: amount, data, durability or an nbt tag, default = durability
